svg.title: portfolioDesign42
svg.text: GAME ART DESIGN
K.U.N.
This project was inspired by one piece in the Chinese traditional classic Daodejind
道德經
in which it describes a mythical creature Kun
鯤
. And Kun is described as “its back is I do
not know how many thousand li in breadth. When it is moved, it flies, its wings obscuring
the sky like clouds” (
逍遙遊
Started from this image, we mapped the concept of Kun into a half-bio-half-machine
creature which serve as an ark to transport survivors in a space age. A little boy, who
was the first person woke up from a long journey, serve as the main character, trying to
save the mission. We tried to keep the whole game experience concise enough. There is
no disturbing instructions, all players need to do is to roam around and explore the
whole map to see what can be done.
I was working with the visual design team to design the visual experience. We chose
dark colors for both scenes and objects to depict this apocalyptic world, as well as
convey the unique atmosphere to players. Instead of hand drawing anything, we ap
plied Illustrator as a tool of assassinating coloring process and making animations. Due
to the features of Illustrator, we tended to use large color patterns and used gradient
color.
-Enter the Final of NetEase Mini Game Competition-
-Enter the Final of NetEase Mini Game Competition-
